14 Gregory Hall
Ifctat January 13, 1960
Mr. Charles F. Hoban
Institute for Cooperative Research
University of Pennsylvania
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Dear Charles:
Would you be willing to serve on NAEB Research Committee?
Duties will not be onerous, and we*d be grateful for your
thinking on certain things from time to time. Would also
help with cross-fertilization.
I do hope you can.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
President
HJS: j p

Dr. Sam Becker , Chairman
